product_name: MuradSuperactive Wrinkle-Fighting Moisturizer SPF 50 with Retinol
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeHSA/FSA eligibleMurad's Wrinkle-Fighting Moisturizer SPF 50 with Retinol firms and smooths fine lines/wrinkles while hydrating skin all day plus ultra-sheer SPF 50 protection for youthful, radiant skin
details: DetailsBenefitsSupercharged 3-in-1 moisturizer with sun-friendly bio-retinoid that works during the day to help smooth fine lines and wrinkles for a more youthful complexionHigh-level SPF 50 leaves skin dewy and protected, with no white castNon-comedogenic, lightweight and fast-absorbingLayers well under makeupKey IngredientsSun-friendly bio-retinoid: derived from algae, this plant-based retinoid helps smooth and rejuvenate for a more youthful, healthier-looking complexionUltra-sheer SPF 50: helps prevent premature aging from UVA/UVB damageResearch ResultsVisibly firms and smooths fine lines and wrinkles*Unveils radiant, lit-from-within skin in just 1 week**4-week consumer perception study on 35 participants, Fitzpatrick II-IVItem 2635511How To UseTo Use: AMApply liberally over face, neck, and chest.For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.IngredientsActive Ingredients: Avobenzone 3.0%, Homosalate 7.0%, Octisalate 5.0%, Octocrylene 7.5% Inactive Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Propanediol, Cocoglycerides, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Palmitic Acid, Cetyl Phosphate, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Urea, Yeast Amino Acids, Trehalose, Inositol, Taurine, Betaine, Bisabolol, Allantoin, Panthenol, Sodium PCA, Tocopheryl Acetate, Glycerin, Lactic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Stearic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Xanthan Gum, Cellulose, Cellulose Gum, Lecithin, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Tocopherol, Titanium Dioxide, Arachidic Acid, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Benzoate, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes, Linalyl Acetate, Citronellol, Fragrance (Parfum), Iron Oxides (CI 77492)Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: To Use: AMApply liberally over face, neck, and chest.For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

reviews.headline: Love it!!!!
reviews.comments: I love everything about it!!! Nice and light weight also has a light smell which is nice üëçüèº

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: This does an adequate job of hydrating my dry skin durinf the summer. Unfortunately, it wont be enough when the weather cools off like the old formula was. I appreciate the higher SPF value, but as someone who consistently repurchased the old formula, I wish Murad would offer both!

reviews.headline: Works Good
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Works good. Not oily.  Feels soft and absorbs very well. Smell is good and light. Not overpowering. The package is cute and carry convenient. Goes along with me.

reviews.headline: Works effectively
reviews.comments: If you're seeking a daily moisturizer that truly delivers on its promises of hydration, wrinkle-fighting support, and robust sun protection, the Superactive Moisturizer SPF 50 Wrinkle Fighting is definitely worth trying. It simplifies your routine while providing essential benefits for healthy, young looking skin

reviews.headline: You might enjoy it!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I received this product in exchange for my honest review. This moisturizer was just okay for me. I do appreciate the 50 SPF! It's hard to find that high of SPF in a lightweight formula. It has a nice cool sensation which I like. But overall, it didn't blow me away. It got the job done, but I wasn't wowed by the texture or finish.

reviews.headline: Lightweight and Fast Absorbing
reviews.comments: My skin feels protected moisturiser  and healthy no more skipping SPF. If you want a fuss free effective daily moisturiser with high sun protection. No irritation or breakouts just happy  balanced skin.

reviews.headline: It's just good
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. This moisturizer was just okay for me. I do appreciate the higher SPF it's not always easy to find SPF 50 in a lightweight formula, and as someone with darker skin who still burns easily, that's a win. But overall, it didn't blow me away. It got the job done, but I wasn't wowed by the texture or finish.

reviews.headline: Great protection!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This product was easy to apply and went on very smoothly. It did not feel heavy on my skin. It gave me great protection and did help with my wrinkles slightly. I think over time I would notice more of a difference. I could wear my makeup over it and it didn't feel caked on. The scent was lovely and not over bearing. The packaging was simple and easy to understand.

reviews.headline: Pricey but worth it!
reviews.comments: I love how easily applicable this product is! There isn't a scent which I appreciate and I didn't feel like I had to apply it too much throughout the day. There isn't a white cast and I felt moisturized throughout the day.  [I received this product in exchange for my honest review]

reviews.headline: Wonderful Product
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Lightweight, doesn't have a terrible scent like most and doesn't leave a white cast on my skin! It lays perfectly under my makeup so it's a win for me.

reviews.headline: New Sunscreen
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. I've been using Murad for over 10 years and I was very excited to give this moisturizer a try! I love that it has SPF 50 and it really does hydrate my skin! The best part is that it doesn't leave my face with like a white layer on it and it absorbs well! There's not much of a scent which I appreciate!

reviews.headline: No White Cast!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Love the packing of the product as it does come with a pump for easy application. It has a cream formula, no fragrance and did not leave a white cast! It also absorbed into the skin with ease!

reviews.headline: loving the sun-friendly bio-retinoid formula!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I am really impressed by this moisturizer! It's lightweight, fast-absorbing, and applies like a dream. Living in South Florida, my skin will roast if I am outside for 15 minutes without any sun protection, so I very much like that my skin is shielded from both UVA and UVB rays with this product- resulting in preventing premature aging and sun damage. I really love the brand is incorporating sun friendly bio-retinoid in their formula. This is a genius idea as the retinoid is working to address the signs of aging, all while being in the sun. Frankly, I've never seen this kind of dermatological advancement before. The texture of my skin has improved, and now my skin looks brighter, smoother, and without brown spots/hyperpigmentation! I also like it is a moisturizer. My skin feels hydrated throughout the day, and I can actually skip a separate moisturizer when using this product. I have not noticed a white cast after application so it's a huge win for me ! It's great value for the price, considering the quality ingredients the product includes. The packaging is not only sleek and travel-friendly but also practical for everyday use. Skincare innovations/scientific discoveries continue to leave me in AWE, and I am HERE FOR IT ! Outstanding work, Murad!

reviews.headline: Love and will repurchase
reviews.comments: This is hands down the best spf/moisturizer I have applied to my skin or that has been the best match for my skin type. I disagree with reviews saying it does not fully absorb, personally My face and skin texture is noticeably smoother and deeply hydrated. My undereyes and brighter and have seen nothing but a glowy and healthy finish hours after the first application , even if I forget to reapply. The price point is great and affordable and lastly I personally like these type of packaging because it's easy to carry, holds alot of product and is mess free. I'll definitely repurchase on my own.

reviews.headline: Good but not great and overpriced
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Good but not great. It works as a sunscreen but it goes on thick and does not full absorb into the skin. I prefer the Asian brands more.  Also has a fragrance, which I definitely do not want in my sunscreen or skincare. I received this in exchange for my honest review and I honestly would not purchase this for the price.

reviews.headline: Moisturizing and no white cast
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've always enjoyed Murad as a brand, and this sunscreen lived up to my expectations. The texture is lightweight and moisturizing, making it very comfortable to wear. I haven't experienced any allergic reactions, which is a big plus for my sensitive skin. It feels ideal for summer days and works well on both the face and body. Bonus: it has no strong scent, which I really appreciate.

reviews.headline: Love This!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I love how my face feels so moisturized after using this product. The best part is- even though it's SPF 50, it blends in the skin well and doesn't leave a white cast. Can't wait to take this with me on vacation soon.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is a great product! There is no scent, a little thick, but super moisturizing. The pump feature is nice as is how it sits so the moisturizer stays closest to the pump area. It works wonders and is a good value. I received for free  this in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.headline: Great sunscreen moisturizer.
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Murad Superactive Wrinkle-Fighting Moisturizer
SPF 50 with Sun Friendly Retinol is a great addition to my skincare routine. I love that it's a moisturizer and sunscreen so I don't have to worry about applying moisturizer first and then sunscreen. It's a fast-absorbing, lightweight, retinol moisturizer that fights wrinkles and fine lines while providing SPF 50 protection. It's also a three-in-one, multi-active retinol moisturizer that can be layered under makeup with no white cast. This sunscreen moisturizer contains sun-friendly bio-retinoid that works to visibly firm and smooth fine lines and wrinkles. Murad is a great skincare brand since it's effective so I would recommend it to others.

reviews.headline: New staple
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This Murad Resurgence Superactive Moisturizer SPF 50 is a perfect two-in-one solution for anyone who wants to simplify their skincare routine. I try to wear sunscreen daily‚Äîeven indoors near windows‚Äîand love that this combines sun protection with a great moisturizer. It applies smoothly, feels lightweight, and gives a soft satin finish without the greasy residue that many sunscreens leave behind. I have very sensitive, combination skin, and had zero irritation or breakouts with this product.

It does have a light scent, so that's something to keep in mind if you're scent-sensitive. But overall, this is a high-quality product that lives up to Murad's great reputation. The packaging is sleek, the pump dispenses well, and while it's a bit of a splurge, I genuinely think it's worth the price. Five out of five from me‚Äîno notes.

media.caption: Dries down sheer with no white cast

media.headline: Makes my skin feel like silk!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

I am 54 years young with fair skin and sunscreen is a must for me everyday.  Rain or shine, at home, or at work, I incorporate sunscreen into my daily routine.  Sunscreen just isn't for sunny days, you need it everyday to prevent damage from harsh lights and UV rays.  

Murad's Resurgence is a 3-in-1 product, and I love a product that has multiple benefits.  Resurgence is a moisturizer with the added benefits of 50 SPF and plant based bio-retinol.  This is a game changer.

As a moisturizer, it packs a punch and hits the mark.  Superior hydration that leaves the skin hydrated, nourished, and silky.

Bio-retinoid is perfect for individuals who are new to retinol, or who have sensitive skin.  It is gentle and its main purpose is to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.  The huge benefit here is that you can use this in the morning, whereas with retinols, you should only use them at night.  A bio-renting I'd is very gentle.

The SPF 50 is another bonus. It provides protection from UVB and UVA damage to help protect the skin.

You apply the Resurgence in the morning, after cleansing and use of your favorite serum.  Unlike other sunscreens, this product will not leave that annoying white cast.

Resurgence is perfect for all skin types, in my opinion.  It is not drying or oily.  It is also perfect for men and women!

***Bonus - I also use it as a hand moisturizer‚Ä¶ your hands need the bio-retinoid and sunscreen too.

I never give 5 stars because no product, in my opinion, is perfect, but this one surpassed all of my expectations.  It left my skin moisturized, protective, and it really improved the appearance of my fine lines!
faceoff_positive.headline: A 3-in1 product that packs a punch!

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this Superactive Moisturizer SPF 50 (Wrinkle-Fighting) in exchange for my review. My opinion is my own based on my experience using the product. I liked that this didn't leave a white cast and seemed to disappear on my skin. It did feel like it left a residue and my skin looked a bit too shiny. When I tried to reapply layer, I got some pilling. I used it on my arm to test without reapplication and it left a residue that rubbed off as the day went on. I don't like how this felt on my skin and prefer something that absorbs a bit more. There's a light citrus fragrance. While it's nice that this has both a higher level of SPF than many facial moisturizers and contains active ingredients, I'm not sure how much of the wrinkle fighting actives are in this product. The data on the website is "consumer perception" and didn't include participants with Fitzpatrick type I skin. I prefer clinical tests when claims say things "100% agree the product was non irritating". Especially since the sample size was 35 people. This is on the pricier end for an SPF product but it does claim to have additional benefits. While this didn't feel heavy and it did provide some moisture, I'm more satisfied with my current 2 products over this multitasker. If you are someone who struggles to wear SPF, I think this might be worth trying. I haven't used it long enough to speak on any longer term, wrinkle reducing benefits.
faceoff_negative.headline: The Texture Didn't Work For Me
